/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the city's vibrant life. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action. The colors in the image are bright and vibrant, further enhancing the lively atmosphere of the scene.
